original_text: Timothy, I tell you this seriously, as God and Christ Jesus see everything that we do. When Christ Jesus comes to rule as king, he will judge everyone. He will judge the people who are alive and also those who have already died. When he appears, he will decide what should happen to them all. So I tell you this now:
korean_text: 하나님 앞과 살아 있는 자와 죽은 자를 심판하실 그리스도 예수 앞에서 그가 나타나실 것과 그의 나라를 두고 엄히 명하노니

sentences.original_text: Timothy, I tell you this seriously
sentences.korean_translation: 디모데야, 내가 너에게 이것을 진지하게 말한다

sentences.original_text: as God and Christ Jesus see everything
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님과 그리스도 예수께서 모든 것을 보시기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: When Christ Jesus comes to rule as king
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도 예수께서 왕으로 다스리러 오실 때

sentences.original_text: He will judge the people who are alive
and also those who have already died
he will decide what should happen to them all
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들 모두에게 어떤 일이 일어나야 할지 결정할 것이다

sentences.original_text: So I tell you this now
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 내가 지금 너에게 이것을 말한다
